member.name: M:Apache.NMS.Test.ConnectionTest.TwoConnections
member.summary: Verify that it is possible to create multiple connections to the broker. There was a bug in the connection factory which set the clientId member which made it impossible to create an additional connection.

member.summary: useful base class for test cases

member.summary: Get the parameters for the ConnectionFactory from the configuration file.
member.param: Parent node of the factoryParams node.
member.returns: Object array of parameter objects to be passsed to provider factory object. Null if no parameters are specified in configuration file.
